segments.text: The girl is so focused on getting a cookie that she doesn’t even notice the water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s reaching up toward her brother, her eyes wide with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see her grinning, even though she’s trying to be sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever fallen like that before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is still drying dishes, completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like laughing at how oblivious everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I realize how dangerous this situation really is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the stool is wobbling more and more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they all make it out of this unharmed.
segments.speaker: PAR
